electric-furnace.description: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

electric-heater.name: Elektriese Verwarmer
electric-heater.description:
The Electric Heater is very useful for bases on snow biome, it will completely remove the "TOO COLD" status and provide 50% "COMFORT" status when nearby, thus regenerating your health.

It can also be placed nearby plants to provide 100% temperature. However, placing electric heater in desert biome may downgrade the temperature of plants. This can also apply to players.

electrical-branch.description: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

elevator.name: Hysbak
elevator.description: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

fluid-combiner.name: Vloeistof Combiner
fluid-combiner.description: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.

fluid-splitter.name: Vloeistofverdeler
fluid-splitter.description: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.

fluid-switch-&-pump.description: A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.

green-industrial-wall-light.description: The Green Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a green light.

hbhf-sensor.description: A Hearbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a roughly 3.6 squares radius with line of sight. Configurable with hammer.

hose-tool.description: A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.

igniter.description: Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received

industrial-combiner.description: Combines three separate industrial connections into one connection.

industrial-conveyor.name: Industriële vervoerband
industrial-conveyor.description: Moves an item from one container to another.

industrial-crafter.name: Industriële Vervaardigder
industrial-crafter.description: Attaches to a workbench to allow automated crafting.

industrial-splitter.description: Splits an industrial connection into three separate connections.

industrial-wall-light.description:
The Industrial Wall Light is a mountable light that can be placed on walls, ceilings or floors. It functions just like the Ceiling Light with smaller light radius. There are 3 variations of the Industrial Wall Light, White, Green and Red.

It was released with the mandatory update "Nomad" that came along with the permanent shop.

large-rechargeable-battery.description: A Large Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

large-solar-panel.description: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.

laser-detector.description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam.

medium-rechargeable-battery.description: A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

memory-cell.description: A 1 bit storage component. The SET Input will set the value to 1. The RESET Input sets the value to 0. Output will pass connected power if value is 1, Inverted Output will pass connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop.

modular-car-lift.name: Modulêre motorhysbak
modular-car-lift.description:
Allows you to modify modular vehicles. Modules can be fully repaired more cost-effective than manual repair by hammer. Cannot move or remove modules with items inside (liquid in fluid tank, items in storage module, parts in engine), but allows you to quick-remove all items. Can add/remove a locks to/from cockpit module and craft keys (lock is removed when module is removed from chassis).

Removing modules can let you research them to be crafted and placed on other chassis later, and removing all modules from a chassis presents you the option to destroy the chassis.

As of "Mixing Table Update," cars no longer decay on powered lifts.

or-switch.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

ptz-cctv-camera.name: Poes kyker
ptz-cctv-camera.description: A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security when paired with the Computer Station. This camera has pan, tilt, and zoom capability.

pipe-tool.description: A tool used to make connections between industrial objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.

powered-water-purifier.name: Aangedrewe watersuiweraar
powered-water-purifier.description: A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.

pressure-pad.description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it.

rand-switch.description: This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the 'Set' input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough.

rf-broadcaster.description: The RF Broadcaster is a electric component that sends out a signal at a frequency. It is possible to make a trap with the RF Broadcaster.

rf-pager.description: An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.

rf-receiver.description: RF Receiver is capable of receiving RF signals from RF Broadcaster or RF Transmitter, if both signal matches, Power Out will start receiving power.

reactive-target.name: Reaktiewe teiken
reactive-target.description: Reactive Targets are handy for practicing your marksmanship without chasing around those slippery newmans. After sustaining enough damage, they fall backwards and reset after a few seconds.

red-industrial-wall-light.description: The Red Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a red light.

root-combiner.description: This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output.

search-light.description: The search light is a deployable item which produces a bright beam of light. It has a 360 degree range of motion, and can be controlled by a player. It runs on electricity much like auto turrets.

seismic-sensor.description: A small device that detects vibrations within a set range. Will output a different power value depending on the explosive type detected, ideal to know when your time has come.

small-generator.description: A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.

small-rechargeable-battery.description: A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

smart-alarm.name: Slim alarm
smart-alarm.description: Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.

smart-switch.name: Slim skakelaar
smart-switch.description: The Smart Switch is an upgrade to the normal Switch. It does not allow unauthorized players to use the Smart Switch and it can be paired to your phone.

splitter.description: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.

sprinkler.description: A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.

storage-adaptor.description: Attach to a storage container to allow industrial input/output connections.

storage-monitor.name: Bergingsmonitor
storage-monitor.description: The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard, Large Storage Box, and Vending Machine to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.

tesla-coil.description: An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.

test-generator.description:
The Test Generator is most known for debugging with electrical stuff. It will always generate 100 power and can be placed anywhere.

It is unobtainable through normal gameplay and can only be obtained by admins.

timer.description: A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.

water-pump.name: Water pomp
water-pump.description: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.

wind-turbine.name: Wind Turbine
wind-turbine.description: Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.

wire-tool.description:
A tool used to make connections between electrical objects.

To use the Wire Tool, aim at an electrical object to highlight the available inputs and outputs (connections). Press the LMB to attach wires to these connections (wires can clip through any item). To disconnect a wired connection, highlight the connection and hold RMB. Wired connections can be disconnected with RMB while simultaneously holding a wire to then be connected. Electrical components will automatically grey out connections that cannot be paired based on their type (input vs output). Hold R to view wire color wheel.

xor-switch.description: An exclusive-or logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. if BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.

above-ground-pool.description: A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.

acoustic-guitar.name: Akoestiese Kitaar
acoustic-guitar.description: The acoustic guitar can be played with different notes using mouse 1 and 2, and at a variable pitch relative to where the player is looking on the vertical plane.

beach-chair.name: Strandstoel
beach-chair.description: The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.

beach-parasol.name: Strandsambreel
beach-parasol.description: A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.

beach-table.name: Strandtafel
beach-table.description: A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.

beach-towel.name: Strandhanddoek
beach-towel.description: A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.

blue-boomer.name: Blue Boomer
blue-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst

blue-roman-candle.name: Blou Romeinse kers
blue-roman-candle.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air

boogie-board.name: Swemplank
boogie-board.description: Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.

boom-box.name: Boom Box
boom-box.description: A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.

canbourine.name: Canbourine
canbourine.description: A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.

car-radio.name: Car Radio
car-radio.description: A small radio to use in cars. Will only work while the car is turned on.

cassette-long.name: Lang - Speel kasset
cassette-long.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.

cassette-medium.name: Middelmatige - Speel kasset
cassette-medium.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.

cassette-short.name: Kort - Speel kasset
cassette-short.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.

cassette-recorder.name: Kassetopnemer
cassette-recorder.description: Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.

champagne-boomer.name: Champagne Boomer
champagne-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts

confetti-cannon.name: Confetti Cannon
confetti-cannon.description: Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.

connected-speaker.name: Gekoppelde luidspreker
connected-speaker.description: A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.

cowbell.name: Harzer
cowbell.description: A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.

disco-ball.name: Disco Ball
disco-ball.description: Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.

disco-floor.name: Disco vloer
disco-floor.description: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

green-boomer.name: Groen Boomer
green-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst

green-roman-candle.name: Groen Romeinse kers
green-roman-candle.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air

inner-tube.name: Binneband
inner-tube.description: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

jerry-can-guitar.name: Jerry Can Kitaar
jerry-can-guitar.description: Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.

junkyard-drum-kit.name: Junkyard Drum Kit
junkyard-drum-kit.description: An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.

laser-light.description: A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.

megaphone.description: A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.

microphone-stand.name: Mikrofoonstaander
microphone-stand.description: A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+attack2] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.

mobile-phone.description: A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialer.

new-year-gong.name: Nuwejaar Gong
new-year-gong.description: Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!

orange-boomer.name: Oranje Boomer
orange-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst

paddling-pool.description: A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.

pan-flute.name: Pan fluit
pan-flute.description: A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.

pattern-boomer.name: Patroon Boomer
pattern-boomer.description: A special boomer which allows you light up the night sky with a custom pattern that you draw. Multiple colors and altitude settings are available.

plumber's-trumpet.name: Loodgieter se basuin
plumber's-trumpet.description: Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.

portable-boom-box.name: Draagbare Radio speeler
portable-boom-box.description:
The Portable Boom Box can stream real world radio stations, and you can only use it on your hands. Voice Props DLC is required to craft it.

Stationary Boom Boxes can be found in the Underwater labs. These can be useful to drown out and "hide" your stepping sounds. Other players may have muted streams and cannot hear Boomboxes, making them useless to cover your steps.

Custom Streams have to be provided by the Server.

red-boomer.name: Rooi Boomer
red-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst

red-roman-candle.name: Rooi Romeinse kers
red-roman-candle.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air

red-volcano-firework.name: Rooi vulkaan vuurwerk
red-volcano-firework.description: Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks

shovel-bass.name: Skop Bass
shovel-bass.description: Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.

skull-spikes.description: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

skull-trophy.name: Skedeltrofee
skull-trophy.description: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

sky-lantern.description: A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.

sled.name: Slee
sled.description: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.

sound-light.description: A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.

sousaphone.name: Sousa phone
sousaphone.description: A collection of used piping that’s been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.

telephone.description: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!

violet-boomer.name: Violet Boomer
violet-boomer.description: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst

violet-roman-candle.name: Violet Romeinse kers
violet-roman-candle.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air

violet-volcano-firework.name: Violet vulkaan vuurwerk
violet-volcano-firework.description: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks

wheelbarrow-piano.description: The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.

white-volcano-firework.name: Wit vulkaan vuurwerk
white-volcano-firework.description: Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks

wrapping-paper.name: Geskenkpapier
wrapping-paper.description: Use this to conceal any item in a lazily wrapped gift

xylobone.name: Xylobone
xylobone.description: A selection of bones that were “acquired” for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.
